Whoops, the message didn't show. Here it is:

Hi,

We apologize for the inconvenience, eGroups had technical difficulties with 
mail delivery last nigh.  Mail was not delivered for approximately 12 hours. 
The problem has been resolved, and the backlogged mail will be delivered to 
the groups as soon as possible.  Once again we apologize for the 
inconvenience.
